snippet: In its cubby-size Brooklyn gymnasium with no concession stands or video boards, St. Francis College is quietly staking its case as New York’s darling college basketball team.
abstract: St Francis College is quietly emerging as candidate for New York's favorite Division I basketball team, despite school's humble facilities; team remains 16- 9 overall in current season, and rests atop Northeast Conference standings with 10-2 record.
lead_paragraph: In its cubby-size Brooklyn gymnasium with no concession stands or video boards, St. Francis College is quietly staking its case as New York’s darling college basketball team.

headline.seo: St. Francis College Finds New Success at Its Throwback Arena, the Pope
headline.main: In a Bandbox Gym, a Team That’s Long Had Room for Improvement
headline.print_headline: In a Bandbox Gym, a Team That’s Long Had Room to Improve
